titleStmt.title: The booke of the common prayer and administracion of the sacramentes, and other rites and ceremonies of the Churche: after the vse of the Churche of England.
Liturgies. Book of common prayer
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: in officina Edouardi Whitchurche [and Nicholas Hill] Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A¹⁰ ² A-P Q⁴ R-T V¹⁰.
Title page and calendar printed in black and red.
Month date of publication from colophon.
The last leaf contains information on pricing.
A later state of STC 16270, with quires G, I, N, and A1,2,7,8, C4,5, R1,2,7,8, and S1-3,6-8 reprinted by Nicholas Hill. C1r is correctly numbered xvii.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
